suite.message: Failed to get item label from ID!
I'm sorry that it was impossible for me to help any more than this, but I was pressed for time and Skycorps have eyes on me 24/7.

There is a console in your room that's hooked into the Firstwind's mainframe. If you enter the clearance code, you should be able to open the hatch at the top of your cell. After that, you'll just need to get out alive...
You've kept this treasure close ever since your mother gave it to you. It is a symbol of your Kariba origins, and it represents your faithfulness to the tribe.
You are grateful that Doctor Willett had given you this pocket gizmo in which to store it, otherwise it might have been confiscated by Skycorps.
This totem grants you the ability to roll on the ground right as you land by pressing  . It will give you a slight speed boost.
